titles: A balad intituled, the dekaye of the Duke
author: Elderton, William, d. 1592?
publisher: Imprinted at London in Fleetestreate beneath the conduit at the signe signe [sic] of Saynt John Evangelist by Thomas Colwell,
notes: Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.)
Concerns the fourth Duke of Norfolk -- Cf. STC (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
keywords: Norfolk, Thomas Howard, --  Duke of, 1538-1572 --  Poetry.
